meanings.definition: To pledge or promise to marry
meanings.sent1: They trothed to each other in front of their families.
meanings.sent2: She trothed her love to him with a ring.
meanings.sent3: The couple trothed to always share their snacks.
meanings.sent4: Their love trothed them together like a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The stars trothed to shine brightly on their wedding day.
